mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_user_login_log ( gmt_create, user_name, app_version, os_type, phone_type, uuid, login_ip, result ) VALUES( NOW(), #{userName}, #{appVersion}, #{osType}, #{phoneType}, #{uuid}, #{loginIp}, #{result} )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM af_user_login_log WHERE user_name = #{userName} and result = 'true'
